column4: what is the easiest way to install a new linux-dist on a computer already running ubuntu?, As a dual boot system, I don't want to have problems with grub
thx, jack, but that's a bit over the top, gonna use fedora for large computations
jack, yeah, dual.. But how, last time I tried to install a system my grub went haywire
when you install next OS it's boot manager will (should) detect Ubuntu.
